page.title: 13DENBURY PRISON
page.content: Where Denbury Prison now stands there used to be an old army camp called Rawlinson Barracks.In{1972}the camp was taken over from the Ministry of Defence and work was started on the site. In{1973}some of the wooden sheds were demolished and the perimeter fence was erected.On{1st May {1974}the first prisoners were received after a big dispute in the area. The prison was officially opened by Dr.Shirley Summerskill. At the beginning of{1982}there were{314 prisoners.The prison project should be fully completed by{1986.}In{1985}there were{448}prisoners held and 231 staff. H.M.P.Channings Wood is a {Category C closed prison}and it provides extra jobs for the area. by {Philip Rhead aged 11.
